OfflineIOHelper - Class in ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.data
Will Handle loading and saving of our offline(cached) stories from local storage.
OfflineIOHelper(Context) - Constructor for class ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.data.OfflineIOHelper
Sole constructor for the OfflineIOHelper class.
OfflineIOHelperTest - Class in ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.test
This class tests the OffLineIOHelper As the Offline helper only contains two methods besides the constructor we test those Those methods are the loadOfflineStories and also the saveOffLineStories which we test with one test case to ensure that loading/saving with file io works properly
OfflineIOHelperTest() - Constructor for class ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.test.OfflineIOHelperTest
constructor for the test

OView<M> - Interface in ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.views
An interface that all OnlineViews implement in order to be properly updated when the online task has downloaded all of the story titles and authors to list.
